name: mean-look
effect: The target cannot switch out normally. Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. This effect ends when the user leaves the field. The target may still escape by using baton pass, u turn, or a shed shell. Both the user and the target pass on this effect with baton pass.
short_effect: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.
